raw_mentions:
Here are the extracted sentences that meet the criteria:

1. 15-methyl-LX A4 (compound 2) also proved to inhibit polymorphonuclear (PMN) adhesion triggered by leukotriene B4 (LTB4) to human endothelial cells with an IC50 of ~ 1 nM.
2. Compounds 1 through 8 (10^-1 - 10^1 µM) were found to inhibit neutrophil adhesion to endothelial cells and their transmigration on epithelial cells.
